name: unsized
content:
unsized adjective
(NOT TREATED)
Add to word list
Add to word list
Unsized material, especially paper or cloth, has not been treated with size (= a substance like glue that makes the material stiff and gives it a hard, shiny surface): Newsprint is unsized, low-quality paper for printing newspapers. She developed a technique of soaking and staining raw, unsized canvas.
More examplesFewer examplesThe artist uses rough, unsized paper which he stretches onto boards.Unsized paper was used to filter the liquid.Beneath the wallpaper, there was unsized horsehair plaster.

unsized adjective
(NO MEASUREMENTS)
If something is unsized, its measurements are unknown or have not been given, or have not been changed: The kimono is unsized. an unsized circuit
